entry.title: Bolt 12 Trusted Contacts
entry.summary: The revised protocol, as discussed during the recent lightning summit, marks a significant departure from previous iterations by eliminating the use of `payer_id`. This adjustment streamlines the process, allowing for the existing offers to remain private without necessitating any modifications. The detailed documentation and specifics of these changes are accessible through the updated protocol available at [GitHub](https://github.com/lightning/blips/pull/42). This update is reflective of the feedback received, showcasing a move towards a more efficient and user-friendly approach within the system.
